meanings.sent1: After her best friend moved away, she felt lonelier than ever.
meanings.sent2: The old house on the hill looked even lonelier in the moonlight.
meanings.sent3: The lonely cat became even lonelier when the other cats ignored him.
meanings.sent4: The lonelier road led to a hidden waterfall in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The lonelier she felt, the more she appreciated the company of her loyal dog.

meanings.sent1: She walked lonelier down the empty street as the night grew darker.
meanings.sent2: The wind howled lonelier as the storm approached.
meanings.sent3: He sang lonelier than a lost bird in the vast forest.
meanings.sent4: The music played lonelier as the party guests slowly left.
meanings.sent5: The old man whistled lonelier than the wind through the abandoned barn.
